instance.description: Evaluates the processing of a route by a given policy.
instance.longDescription: Find how the specified route is processed through the specified routing policies.

nodes.description: Only examine filters on nodes matching this specifier

direction.description: The direction of the route, with respect to the device (IN/OUT)

values.name: in
values.description: The route is inbound to the device

values.name: out
values.description: The route is outbound from the device

policies.description: Only consider policies that match this specifier

inputRoutes.description: The BGP route announcements to test the policy on
